sentence.Network_en: They have been galvanised into collective action — militarily, politically and economically.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们在形势驱使下已经在政治、经济和军事上采取了联合行动。

sentence.Network_en: The checkpoint was abandoned as militarily indefensible.
sentence.Network_cn: 检查站因为军事上无法防御而被舍弃。

sentence.Network_en: They remain unwilling to intervene militarily in what could be an unending war.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们仍然不愿意对一场可能会旷日持久的战争进行军事干预。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(M) ... militant 好战的 militarily 在军事上 militarise 军事化.

I might have arguments with the size of Reagan's military buildup , but given the Soviet invasion of Afghanistan , staying ahead of the Soviets militarily seemed a sensible thing to do .我也许对里根军备增加有所疑问，但是由于苏联入侵了阿富汗，在军事上领先苏联似乎是极为合理的选择。
Uganda's president , Yoweri Museveni , may also be dragging out negotiations in the hope of smashing Mr Kony militarily .乌干达总统YoweriMuseveni可能也正在拖延谈判，希望能粉碎Kony先生的军事力量。
we have got great achievements militarily , politically and economically .我们在军事、政治、经济等方面取得了巨大的成绩。

list.abs: The officer was militarily severe , the soldier obedient ., 这个军官是军纪森严 , 这个士兵则唯命是从.
even small diversions from civilian stocks can be militarily useful .甚至从民用反应堆中转移出少量的材料也可以用于军事用途。
军事分界线 military demarcation line军事过硬 militarily competent军事援助 military aid
outsiders cannot intervene militarily in syria .外部势力不能武力干涉叙利亚。

entry.def: Military means relating to the armed forces of a country.

example.tran: 也许有必要采取军事行动。

example.ex: The president is sending in almost 20,000 military personnel to help with the relief efforts.
example.tran: 总统将派出近2万名军事人员协助救灾工作。

entry.def: Military means relating to or belonging to the army, rather than to the navy or the air force.

example.ex: The attack has caused severe damage to American naval and military forces.
example.tran: 这次攻击给美国的海军和陆军都造成了重创。

entry.tran: 军队;军人;(尤指)高级军官
entry.def: The military are the armed forces of a country, especially officers of high rank.

example.ex: The bombing has been far more widespread than the military will admit...
example.tran: 轰炸的范围远远大于军方愿意承认的范围。

example.ex: Did you serve in the military?

entry.def: Military means well-organized, controlled, or neat, in a way that is typical of a soldier.

example.ex: Your working day will need to be organized with military precision.
example.tran: 需要对你的工作日进行精确有序的安排。

example.ex: He has a military bearing, never failing to carry himself erect.
example.tran: 他有一种军人的风姿，身板总是挺得笔直。

auth_sentence.content: He says the problem can not be solved militarily.
auth_sentence.res_content: He says the problem can not be solved militarily.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He says the problem can not be solved militarily.

auth_sentence.content: You can only coerce politically, economically and militarily.
auth_sentence.res_content: You can only coerce politically, economically and militarily.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: You can only coerce politically, economically and militarily.

auth_sentence.content: They support Israel, politically, financially and militarily.
auth_sentence.res_content: They support Israel, politically, financially and militarily.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They support Israel, politically, financially and militarily.
